data.title: I'm fourteen and I've been afraid of dolls almost my whole life. Why?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 9): Clearly you saw a movie or someone teased you or did something to traumatize you into being afraid of dolls. Somehow you link dolls to a particularly possibly traumatic event.

The second theory is you’ve “decided” at some point that you’re afraid of dolls for no reason and have ...
